hero.subtitle: Expert CiviCRM & Drupal Solutions for Non-Profits and Enterprises.

about.title: About Us
about.text: SmallPush is a new enterprise founded by an expert with over 14 years of experience in the software industry. We specialize in custom developments for CiviCRM and Drupal, helping organizations streamline their operations and manage their data effectively.

civi.title: CiviCRM Custom Development
civi.text: Tailored CiviCRM solutions to fit your organization's unique needs.

drupal.title: Drupal Development
drupal.text: Robust and scalable Drupal websites and applications.

payment.title: Spanish Payments Ecosystem
payment.text: Expert integration with Spanish payment gateways and banking systems.

fiscal.title: Fiscal Models Management
fiscal.text: Solutions for managing fiscal data and generating tax reports (e.g., Model 182).

ads.title: Ads Development
ads.text: Customer acquisition campaigns optimized to maximize conversion.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.text: Implementation of Artificial Intelligence solutions to automate and empower your business.
